description: S'mores come to life in this whole food smoothie bowl, bringing the best of campfire flavors into a hearty breakfast or tasty snack.

title: S'mores Cocktail
description: A classic combination of flavors makes this s'mores cocktail an easy-to-make crowd pleaser. Plus, we use coconut milk to give us that rich, decadent taste without the dairy

title: All-in-One Summer Garden Salad
description: Summer salads have never been easier! Using fresh vegetables and herbs from your garden, whip up a tasty herb-vinaigrette and toss with your shredded vegetables all in the same bowl, saving you time and dishes to clean.

title: Apple Molasses Cake
description: This delicious caramelized apple cake brings the best flavors of fall into an easy-to-make cake, with a batter quickly made in the Vitamix Food Processor.

title: Banana Walnut Breakfast Oats
description: Simple and easy to prepare, make these oats the night before for a quick, healthy breakfast that will have you out the door in no time. No need to buy almond milk; the ingredients are already in this recipe—just blend and add your oats and other flavoring ingredients.

title: Blackberry Iced Tea Bramble
description: Green tea, blackberries, mint, and lime make up the heart of this cocktail. The same recipe—minus the gin—makes a delicious non-alcoholic mocktail. Tonic or ginger beer adds a bit of effervescence.

title: Squash Quiche
description: The flavors of fall blend perfectly in this quiche, lined with a hearty crust and filled with a savory egg filling, to bring you a delicious breakfast or brunch dish.

title: Carrot and Farro Salad with Apricot Dressing
description: Carrots have a unique sweetness to them, but especially in the wintertime. The dried apricot dressing pairs very well with the sweetness of the carrots, earthy farro, the crunch of red onion, and bitter parsley.

title: Carrot Cannellini Bean Soup
description: A flavorful winter warmer, carrots meld with cannellini beans to make for a filling, healthy, nutrient-dense soup that's sure to be a crowd pleaser.

title: Chocolate Date Truffles
description: These simple holiday treats are easy to make and hard to put down. Made with chocolate, dates, and cocoa, they're a naturally sweet dessert and a great gift idea for the holiday season.

title: Cider Date Jam
description: Nothing gets more whole-food or homemade than our apple cider date jam. It combines apples, cinnamon sticks, cloves, dates, and fresh orange for a delicious mix of flavorful fall fruits and spices.

title: Fennel, Parsnip & Pear Salad
description: This perfect-for-winter salad is packed with whole grains and fresh vegetables and topped with a sweet, acidic, creamy dressing.

title: Whole Grain Loaf Bread
description: A mix of 6 different grains come together to create a nice whole grain loaf recipe that is extra yeasty and delicious. Vitamix-made cornmeal, whole wheat flour, and hazelnut milk make this perfect for a cold winter snack.

title: Roasted Beet & Citrus Salad & Creamy Horseradish Dressing
description: Beets are abundant during the winter months and they're so delicious when roasted and paired with some simple ingredients. The horseradish adds a little heat to balance the dish.

title: Gingersnap Granola Bars
description: Granola bars are simple to make at home and easy to customize by adding your favorite ingredients. Try our fall-themed bars—they’re loaded with healthy fiber and fats from the whole-food ingredients.

title: Gingersnap Granola Bars
description: Granola bars are simple to make at home and easy to customize by adding your favorite ingredients. Try our fall-themed bars—they’re loaded with healthy fiber and fats from the whole-food ingredients.

title: Turkey Pumpkin Bolognese Sauce
description: Lean turkey and cooked pumpkin make this sauce an excellent dinner option, providing plenty of delicious flavors to complement your meal

title: White Chicken Chili
description: Non-traditional chili that comes together easily with a few ingredients. Do it on the stove top or in a slow cooker for even easier results.

title: Sweet Potato, Vegetable and Farro Hash
description: Make Vitamix your sous chef by turning the food processor or blending container into the quickest chopper around. These ingredients create a great mix for breakfast, lunch or dinner meal.

title: Pear and Hazelnut Cream Tart
